actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the operation and modernize the facilities of the Veterans' Canteen Service of the Veterans' Administration.

summary.text: Eliminates the present restriction which limits veterans' canteen service for persons not hospitalized or domiciled at the hospital or home to the sale of merchandise or services for consumption or use on the premises. Makes specified changes in the method of financing the Veterans' Canteen Service. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 4203; 4204; 4206)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the operation and modernize the facilities of the Veterans' Canteen Service of the Veterans' Administration.
